column5: Got this email today,very funny Scooter
Copy and paste is your friend Scooter!
I can't get the picture to show up when I cut and paste?????
do you have a photobucket account?  it's free and it's how most of us share pic's on the site.
Thanks blakewalk, I tried for hours to get that picture up!! I don't know how you did and and don't want to Scooter

He uploaded it to his photobucket account Scooter, it really does make life easier when posting pics on the internet!!!  [ img]http://i346.photobucket.com/albums/p437/DonPerdew_photos/ImageMA23207702-0020.jpg[/img ]  It looks like that when you copy and paste it, I put a space inbetween the first and last bracket so you could see it.
